subtitle: Dedicated to building modern, visually appealing, and functional websites.
about: I am a Software Developer who is accustomed to working on full-stack projects using Django, Laravel, and Flutter. I have experience building automation dashboards, system integrations, and features that simplify user workflows. My background in Informatics and experience as a Quality Assurance professional help me be more thorough in analyzing problems and ensuring applications run reliably.
about2: I have handled various projects such as automated oil and gas monitoring systems , payment and ticketing platforms, queue management and barcode-based registration systems, as well as mobile applications with real-time data synchronization. I am experienced in designing architectures, developing features, and ensuring application performance and security remain optimal.
